# Class fields FileManager.FileManagerClass_description=Description
# Live table generic keys filemanager.livetable.doc.title=Page title filemanager.livetable.doc.name=Page name filemanager.livetable.doc.space=Space filemanager.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name filemanager.livetable.doc.author=Last Author filemanager.livetable.doc.creator=Creator filemanager.livetable.doc.date=Update date filemanager.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date filemanager.livetable._avatar=Avatar filemanager.livetable._images=Images filemanager.livetable._attachments=Attachments filemanager.livetable._actions=Actions filemanager.livetable._actions.edit=Edit filemanager.livetable._actions.delete=Delete filemanager.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Live table specific keys filemanager.livetable.description=Description filemanager.appname=File Manager
# Old keys, from the first version of the application. contrib.FM.description=Description of the file contrib.FM.noDescription=No description of this file is available. contrib.FM.noAttachment=No file is attached to this document. Add one by clicking on "edit" or by directly adding it as an attachment. contrib.FM.editDescription=Save and view contrib.FM.change.explanations=You can manage the file(s) to attach to this document using the "Attachments" section below. You can also tag this document with the application at the bottom of this section, so it would be easier to find it.
rendering.macro.filetagcloud.name=FileManager tag cloud rendering.macro.filetagcloud.description=Displays the cloud of file tags in this wiki or in the specified space, if any.
rendering.macro.filemanagerdoc.name=File Manager Document rendering.macro.filemanagerdoc.description=Inserts a file manager document in a page, with or without preview rendering.macro.filemanagerdoc.parameter.page.name=Page rendering.macro.filemanagerdoc.parameter.page.description=Page name of the FileManager document rendering.macro.filemanagerdoc.parameter.preview.name=Preview rendering.macro.filemanagerdoc.parameter.preview.description=True if a preview should be included
